column1: # columns: short name #1, short name #2, long name, release date, import flag
# The first set of short names are those used in the URLs of the expansion
# symbols on Gatherer.  The second set of short names are those listed on [1],
# which, despite differing from the Gatherer abbreviations in numerous
# instances, are/were apparently used internally by Wizards for some purposes.
# The long set names are as listed on Gatherer.
# Exact release dates are taken from [1].
# The import flags specify which sets to scrape in order to get a list of all
# cards with a near-minimum number of HTTP requests.  Sets with a flag of "1"
# are scraped, while sets with a flag of "0" (usually sets that didn't
# introduce any new cards) are not.
# Sets not listed in Gatherer (e.g., Anthologies, Deckmasters 2001) are not
# Sets are commented out iff they have not yet been released and/or are Un-sets.

column3: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
